meanings.sent1: The quieting music helped me fall asleep peacefully.

meanings.definition: The act of calming or soothing.
meanings.sent1: His quieting presence always brought a sense of peace to the room.
meanings.sent2: The quieting of the storm brought relief to the frightened villagers.
meanings.sent3: The quieting of the situation prevented further arguments from arising.
meanings.sent4: The quieting of her fears allowed her to finally relax and unwind.
meanings.sent5: The quieting of the waves signaled the end of the turbulent storm.

meanings.definition: The process of reducing noise or disturbance.
meanings.sent1: The quieting of the engine made the car ride much more enjoyable.
meanings.sent2: The quieting of the crowd allowed the speaker's voice to be heard clearly.
meanings.sent3: The quieting of the wind chimes signaled the arrival of a peaceful evening.
meanings.sent4: The quieting of the protests brought a sense of calm to the city streets.
meanings.sent5: The quieting of the traffic noise made the park a serene oasis in the bustling city.
